name: Lost in the Pyramid
description:
A weird archaeologist discovers a lost pyramid, enter it & unravel its mysteries

Lost in the Pyramid is an adventure game idea with funny dialogues and great humour. Your character is an archaeologist which discovers a brand new Pyramid. Your task is to enter the Pyramid, explore it, unravel its mysteries and try not to die. (Other Crazysoft games you might know: The Odyssey, Zeus Quest, The Final Battle).

You are an unsuccessful archeologist, but a huge fan of atlantis, Egypt, Cleopatra curse, spirit of anubis, osiris, horus, pharaoh, luxor, poseidon and all there is about pyramids actually. After a vivid dream you decide to go to Israel, to a fable wonderland / lost city, find your lost pyramid and end its long disappearance. Out of pure luck you find the pyramid and enter it. Inside there are egyptian antiquities and artifact to take and huge misteries to solve like reincarnation and spirits. Play this weird game and try not to die...

FEATURES
• Fully translated into several languages.
• Hilarious story and humorous dialogs.
• Weird rooms to explore.
• Out of the box puzzles to solve
• Funny scenes
• Two different game endings
• Export your Hi-Score online and compare it with everybody.
